mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents (contentCategoryId , viewCount ,title , content , password , nickname , submitDate) VALUES (#{contentCategoryId} , #{viewCount} ,#{title} , #{content} , #{password} , #{nickname} , #{submitDate})
mapper.select: SELECT contentId,contentCategoryId, viewCount,content,nickname,title, submitDate,updateDate, (SELECT IF ( COUNT(*)>0 , 'true' , 'false' ) FROM files WHERE files.contentIdHaveFile= contents.contentId) AS file_existence FROM contents WHERE contentId=#{id}
SELECT contentId,contentCategoryId,password, viewCount,content,nickname,title, submitDate,updateDate FROM contents WHERE contentId=#{id}
